t: Vindicate*pn me, O God, and plead my case against an ungodly nation; O*ln deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man!
For*ln You are the God of my strength; why have You rejected me? Why*ln do I go mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
O*ln send out Your light and Your truth, let them lead me; Let*ln them bring me to Your holy hill And*ln to Your dwelling places.
Then*ln I will go to the altar of God, To*ln God my exceeding joy; And*ln upon the lyre I shall praise You, O God, my God.
Why*ln are you in despair, O my soul? And*ln why are you disturbed within me? Hope*ln in God, for I shall again praise Him, The*ln help of my countenance and my God.
